mapper.select: select p.project_no, p.title, p.start_dt, p.end_dt, m.member_no owner_no, m.name owner_name, m.email owner_email, m2.member_no member_no, m2.name member_name, m2.email member_email from pms_project p inner join pms_member m on p.member_no=m.member_no left outer join pms_project_member pm on p.project_no=pm.project_no inner join pms_member m2 on pm.member_no=m2.member_no order by project_no desc, m2.name asc

select p.project_no, p.title, p.content, p.start_dt, p.end_dt, m.member_no owner_no, m.name owner_name, m.email owner_email, m2.member_no member_no, m2.name member_name, m2.email member_email from pms_project p inner join pms_member m on p.member_no=m.member_no left outer join pms_project_member pm on p.project_no=pm.project_no inner join pms_member m2 on pm.member_no=m2.member_no where p.project_no=#{no}
